# Header:

it seems RcppParallel in standalone Cpp file requires either:

```{Rcpp}
#include <Rcpp.h>
// [[Rcpp::depends(RcppParallel)]]
#include <RcppParallel.h>

using namespace Rcpp;
using namespace RcppParallel;
```

or:

```{Rcpp}
// [[Rcpp::depends(RcppParallel, RcppArmadillo)]]
#include <RcppArmadillo.h>
#include <RcppParallel.h>


using namespace Rcpp;
using namespace RcppParallel;
```

otherwise, it would report "ERROR: redefined" on constructors and Rcpp NumericMatrix not a named type.
